name: Slim down Firefox GUI
description:
Updated, should work/look better with new Firefox 2 Beta 
(And i should say, only tested on Windows)

This will reduce your GUI size for Firefox - (Small Statusbar is included)
Easy to make your own changes to!

(You should Right-Click on Toolbar and Customize to use Small Icons)
